cross: Paphiopedilum Odette's Magic x Paphiopedilum Gyorgy Nagy

measurements.description: One striking flower on one staked 23.0-cm upright inflorescence; dorsal sepal apiculate, cream heavily overlaid burgundy, veined black-burgundy; synsepal burgundy, striated saturated-burgundy; petals ciliate, cream, proximally blushed green, heavily overlaid burgundy distally and on upper margins; pouch downy, black-burgundy; staminode cream, suffused rose apically, burgundy distally; substance firm; texture glossy.

corrections.reason: Updated to reflect actual source page URL structure (YYMMDD/awardNum.html)

changeLog.reason: Updated from YYMMDD to YYYYMMDD format to match actual website structure
